job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions and providing feedback for improvement, which is a core task in model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are software development activities, even if they are AI-related.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities with human expertise to enhance a service, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the need for rapid learning and adaptation to new products, indicating a fast-paced learning environment.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: Emphasizes self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating a need for individuals who can unblock themselves.

profile.rationale: The job primarily focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and improving existing AI models through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning, the core responsibility appears to be the application and integration of AI within a support framework, rather than deep model development or research. The tasks lean more towards using and enhancing AI as part of a broader system (customer support) rather than building AI from the ground up. Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a customer support context. The tasks are specific enough to categorize, although the 'AI model fine-tuning' aspect could be interpreted in different ways. The emphasis on rapid ramp-up and self-sufficiency also provides clear soft skill indicators. The profile assignment is reasonably confident based on the described blend of tasks.
